tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nidhi is truly exceptional. From the moment my husband and I met her, we knew we were in capable hands. Her thorough explanations and calm demeanor immediately put us at ease. Having been to several gynecologists over the years, none have matched the level of care and professionalism we experienced with Dr. Nidhi.Our journey began when we moved to a new city and were anxious about finding a new gynecologist. From our first appointment, it was evident that Dr. Nidhi was the right choice. Her clinic was welcoming, and the staff were friendly and efficient, making the process smooth and stress-free.During our initial consultation, Dr. Nidhi took the time to get to know us and understand our medical history. She listened attentively to our concerns, demonstrating genuine interest in our well-being. Her ability to explain complex medical issues in clear, concise language was invaluable, making us feel informed and reassured.Dr. Nidhi‚Äôs empathy and compassion stood out throughout our sessions. She understood the daunting nature of gynecological visits and went above and beyond to make us comfortable. One particular instance involved her patiently explaining treatment options, ensuring we made an informed decision without feeling rushed.Her expertise is evident in every aspect of her practice. She stays current with the latest advancements in gynecology and shares her knowledge with patients, reflecting her commitment to providing the best care. Dr. Nidhi‚Äôs personal touch, remembering details about our lives and showing genuine concern, makes us feel valued and respected.A holistic approach to healthcare is another hallmark of Dr. Nidhi‚Äôs practice. She acknowledges the link between physical, emotional, and mental well-being, providing comprehensive care. Her state-of-the-art clinic, modern facilities, and efficient staff further enhance the patient experience.Over our treatment period, we developed deep trust and respect for Dr. Nidhi. Her unwavering commitment to her patients and exceptional care have profoundly impacted our lives. We have confidently recommended her to friends and family, assured they will receive the same outstanding care.In conclusion, Dr. Nidhi is undoubtedly one of the best gynecologists we have ever encountered. Her thorough explanations, calm demeanor, and genuine concern make her an exceptional healthcare provider. We wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking compassionate and expert care. Dr. Nidhi has set a new standard for gynecological care, and we are incredibly fortunate to be her patients.Thank you, Dr. Nidhi, for your unwavering dedication and exceptional care. We are truly grateful for all you have done for us.

context: Pelviscopy,Vaginal Infection Treatment,Family Planning,Gynae Problems,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,
review: Dr. Nidhi is truly exceptional. From the moment my husband and I met her, we knew we were in capable hands. Her thorough explanations and calm demeanor immediately put us at ease. She takes the time to truly understand her patients before addressing any concerns, making the entire experience incredibly reassuring. By the end of our session, we felt not only informed but also genuinely cared for. Following her expert guidance, we confidently proceeded with treatment, knowing we had made the right choice. Dr. Nidhi is undoubtedly one of the best gynecologists we've ever encountered, and we wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking compassionate and expert care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When I heard the news that my wife was pregnant, we searched for a doctor, and we did not know that Dr. Nidhi Bansal Gupta would be our favorite doctor forever, as right from the beginning she treated my wife wonderfully until my baby was born. I cannot define the experience in words; it was exceptionally awesome. I recommend her as the best gynecologist in Delhi. Besides, she is very grounded, down to earth, and polite. The way she guides you is once again exceptionally excellent. I wish her success in her endeavors and good luck. I marked 5 stars, but if we had some more, I would certainly have selected that option.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Nidhi mam for PCOD and anovulation which was treated successfully followed by my first pregnancy consultation. My journey has been wonderful. She has been very transparent regarding the treatment since the beginning and had explained everything in detail. She has been always available in case of any emergency and had been very patient with us in answering all our queries as first time parents. I would strongly recommend her to anyone who is seeking help regarding ovarian cysts, irregular periods, Anovulation or Pregnancy. Thanks doc for being thereüòä

context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Labor and Delivery,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
I feel myself really lucky to have my pregnancy treatment and delivery under the supervision of Dr. Nidhi. She is not only an intelligent doctor who gives medicinal treatment but a nice person also who gives personal attention to patients in urgent situations. Doctor is always available for her patients and takes regular update also in crucial situations. It was really surprising for me when I received a concern call from Doctor for my health update in one crucial situation in my 8th month.
Last but not the least, staff of Doctor Nidhi clinic is also very humble and cooperative.
Thank you very much Doctor Nidhi for the quality treatment, guidance and concerns during my pregnancy journey.

reply_text: Thanks a lot dear!!!. My best wishes for all of youüòä

review: I had a small question but yet that was stressing me throughout the night. After the doctor gave me the results I was much more relieved. I couldn't find any answers and all the other mediums weren't working. At that time a reply was what I was waiting for. And the first doctor to answer me was Dr. Nidhi. Thanks a lot.

review: *** **** ******* *** ******* *************** **** ****** Words are insufficient to describe the amount of awesomeness you displayed while attending me throughout my pregnancy. Our heartfelt thankfulness for caring and comforting. Your presence holds a positive vibe that is more powerful than your prescribed medicines. review: Was most impressed by the way Dr. Nidhi listened patiently to each and every aspect of my problem, and boosted my confidence of how my compliance to a regular exercise plan along with medications can do wonders in my case. I believed in her and after a month, I have a good regularity in my cycles, my hair fall and acne have reduced significantly and ultrasound reports also suggesting reversal of PCOD. Thanks Dr. Nidhi !!
